data.name: Trapper Simulator
data.detailed_description:
Check more our games

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1741390/Farm_Manager_2021__Agrotourism_DLC/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1123830/Farm_Manager_2021/


About the Game

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1263620/Yacht_Mechanic_Simulator/

Be stealth be silent setup the perfect traps!

You'll be able to set up the trap in the open wild world and find a different kind of animals than no other game has got.

- You'll be able to build your own designed traps and find used ones among the trees.
- Beware of dangerous animals which can attack you.
- Hide in your cosy place and expand it,
- Escape into the wild and find how to survive.
- Find how to create different hunting experience mainly with your skills and experience.

Work needs to be done to achieve success.
Explorer wild forests and prepare yourself to different approaches off hunting, without firearms.

Use your brain more than a weapon and catch prey.

Let's begin Hunting.

data.short_description: Be stealth be silent setup the perfect traps! Use your brain more than a weapon and show your skills, you need them to survive. Let's begin Hunting.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 / AMD Phenom II X4 965
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 550 Ti / Intel HD 620
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4670K / AMD FX-8320 or equivalent
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 960 / Radeon R9 290X
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
